body_html:
Hi, similar problem with dlib.

davisking/dlib#1383

conda create -n test_env python=3.6
source activate test_env
conda install pytorch-cpu -c pytorch -y
conda install dlib -c conda-forge -y

body:
Hi, similar problem with dlib.

https://github.com/davisking/dlib/issues/1383

```
conda create -n test_env python=3.6
source activate test_env
conda install pytorch-cpu -c pytorch -y
conda install dlib -c conda-forge -y
```
